definition: to move troops to/(fig.) to move to/to shift to
to move/to shift/to change/to alter/to remove

sentences.english: When he’s done, he goes to China and becomes the top man there.
sentences.chinese: 稱霸之後，他又移師中國，十年成爲業界領頭羊。

sentences.english: For years he then worked the con in Las Vegas before fleeing to England in the 1970s.
sentences.chinese: 他在拉斯維加斯行騙多年，之後在70年代移師英國。
